snippet: Disney-owned Marvel Studios will become partners with DMG Entertainment on the film, which is set to be released next year. Bringing in a partner on such a successful franchise is considered unusual.
abstract: Disney-owned Marvel Studios will become partners with DMG Entertainment on the film, which is set to be released next year. Bringing in a partner on such a successful franchise is considered unusual.

headline.main: Disney to Team With Chinese Company to Make 'Iron Man 3'
headline.print_headline: ... And ‘Iron Man’ Is Going to China
